title: This is a full stack to-do list application that uses React.js as the front-end library, Express as the back-end framework, and Firebase as the database and authentication service. The application is deployed on the Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
content: To-do lists help individuals allocate their time wisely by providing a visual representation of tasks and deadlines, enabling them to plan their day or week more effectively.

title: A program a designed to assist in the evaluation of a speakers speech structure, including the opening, body, and conclusion.- Evaluation Assistant Propram
content: A program a designed to assist in the evaluation of a speakers speech structure, including the opening, body, and conclusion.

title: This program is a login demo that demonstrates a secure and controlled access mechanism for users, allowing them to authenticate their identity before accessing specific features, protected content, or restricted areas of an application.
content: Programmers can then adapt and customize based on their specific application requirements.
